Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
class stSlimMSTSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >

This class template implements the SlimTree MST split algorithm.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino@icmc.sc.usp.br)
Todo:
Documentation review.

Tests!

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
void stSlimMSTSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::JoinClusters (  int  cluster1,
int  cluster2
)  [protected]
 

Joins 2 clusters. This method will insert custer2 into cluster1.

The state of cluster2 will change to DEATH_SENTENCE.

Parameters:
cluster1 Cluster 1.
cluster2 Cluster 2.

template<class ObjectType, class EvaluatorType>
void stSlimMSTSplitter< ObjectType, EvaluatorType >::PerformMST (   )  [protected]
 

Performs the MST algorithm. This method will split the objects in 2 clusters. The result of the processing will be found at the array Cluster.

Warning:
DMat must be initialized.
